description: Demolition of existing buildings and erection of a 28 storey (86.5m AOD) building (plus basement) to provide a build-to-rent/private rented sector scheme, comprising 129 self-contained residential units (Use Class C3), 791sqm of co-working office floorspace (Use Class B1a) and 64sqm of cafâ€š floorspace (Use Class A3), public realm improvements, hard and soft landscaping, communal amenity space (including child play space), secure cycle storage, car parking spaces and car lift, provision of access for a permanent mooring for public use on Deptford Creek, and other associated works. (THIS IS A DEPARTURE FROM THE DEVELOPMENT PLAN)(Reason for re-consultation: submission of revised documents; modification to the red line boundary to include creekside barge; additional 18 dwellings; additional two storeys (facilitated by internal modification to the building as the height of 86.5m AOD remains the same); additional cycle parking and an increase in shared amenity space)
site_name: RAVENSBOURNE WHARF, NORMAN ROAD, LONDON, SE10
